alert.note: Alert for Coastal Jefferson; Inland Jefferson; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 12:27PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Wakulla, southwestern Jefferson and southeastern Leon Counties through 115 PM EDT... At 1226 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles east of Florida A And M to near Woodville to near St. Marks. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... St. Marks, Woodville, Tallahassee, Wakulla, Newport, Cody, Hells Half Acre, Nash, Thomas City, Chaires, Waukeenah, Wacissa, Wacissa Springs, Natural Bridge, Apalachee Regional Park, Chaires Crossroads, Hyde Park, Capps, Plum Orchard and Capitola. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
